main: Counter turns into a free S3 with 6+ {keyword:Envy} A-Reson.
S2 and S3 gain Offense Level by A-Reson, double when it's {keyword:Envy}.
other: Every turn, her passive inflicts {status:RetaliationBook} on the enemy that dealt the most damage to allies on the previous turn, giving her bonus Coin Power against that enemy.
Her passive also gives her {status:VioletDamageUp} for every 3 hits that enemies deal against allies.

1030601.desc:
- Gain 1 [VioletDamageUp] next turn every time the enemies strike an ally(including this unit) 3 times. (Max 5)
- Apply [RetaliationBook] to the unit that dealt the most Skill damage to an ally.
- If the main target has [RetaliationBook], Final Power +1
1030601.name: Vengeance Tattoo

1030611.desc:
- Gain 1 [VioletDamageUp] next turn every time the enemies strike an ally(including this unit) 3 times. (Max 5)
- Apply [RetaliationBook] to the unit that dealt the most Skill damage to an ally.
- If the main target has [RetaliationBook], Coin Power +1
1030611.name: Vengeance Tattoo

1030621.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Max HP gains 1 Blunt DMG Up next turn every time the enemies strike an ally(not including this unit) 6 times. (Max 2)
1030621.name: Favoritism

data.desc: [StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 Offense Level by (highest A-Reson./3) (Max 4)
data.name: Proof of Loyalty

data.desc:
[StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 Offense Level by (highest A-Reson./3) (Max 4)
If the highest A-Reson is Envy A-Reson, Gain 50% additional Offense Level to the Offense Level gained by the above effect (rounded down)
data.name: Proof of Loyalty

data.desc:
[StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 Offense Level by (highest A-Reson./3) (Max 4)
If the highest A-Reson is Envy A-Reson, Gain 50% additional Offense Level to the Offense Level gained by the above effect (rounded down)
data.name: Proof of Loyalty

data.desc:
[StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 Offense Level by (highest A-Reson./2) (Max 6)
If the highest A-Reson is Envy A-Reson., boost the Offense Level gained by the above effect by 50% (rounded down)
Gain double the Offense Level from the above effects in Focused Encounters with 7 or fewer Participant Limits.
data.name: Proof of Loyalty

descs: [EndSkill] If target is defeated, 1 ally with the least SP heals 6 SP

data.desc:
[StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 Offense Level by (highest A-Reson./3) (Max 4)
If the highest A-Reson is Envy A-Reson, Gain 50% additional 'Offense Level' to the 'Offense Level' gained by the above effect (rounded down)
data.name: A Just Vengeance

data.desc:
[StartBattle] At 6+ sum of Envy A-Reson., use 'A Just Vengeance' as Counter.
Upon activating the above effect, the Skill's affinity is changed to Envy.
(Leftmost 'Multifold Retribution' is activated first. Activates 2 times per turn)
data.name: Multifold Retribution
